conversation.content: Um, hi. I need to, uh, dispute a charge. Es como, um, mi primera vez haciendo esto, la verdad.
Got it, no problem at all, vale, déjame abrir el formulario de disputa aquí, solo necesito tu número de cuenta primero si lo tienes a mano?
It's, um, probably 4-4-7-2. Eh, espera. 9-2. Creo.
Okay so, um, I've got account 4472-92 here and, uh, let me just—bueno espera, necesito el completo—¿tienes el número entero? Deberían ser, um, 12 dígitos en total.
Perfect perfect, so, um, account ACC-447292881533 is up and, uh, puedo ver las transacciones recientes aquí, entonces ¿cuál cargo estamos, um, mirando hoy?
The, uh, ninety dollar one. De, um, ¿el martes? Creo que era, eh, Beach Supply Plus.
Yep, transaction TXN-829374-BSP for $89.99 posted Tuesday the 15th, código de comerciante Beach Supply Plus.
Yeah so, um, they charged me for, uh, rescue tubes I never got? Es que, um, los necesito para el trabajo.
Oh you're a—wait let me just, um, make a note here... equipamiento de socorrista no recibido... y, uh, ¿has intentado contactar al comerciante primero o...?
Three times. Siguen diciendo que está entregado.
Okay so, um, that's frustrating, déjame—vale, um, como esto es equipamiento de seguridad para tu trabajo voy a, uh, acelerar esto, número de referencia DSP-7749823-P.
Um, how long does this, er, usually take? Porque ya he tenido que, uh, comprar reemplazos.
So disputes normally run 5-7 business days but I'm marking this priority, dado que es equipamiento de trabajo, debería procesarse en 24-48 horas máximo.
That's, um, actually helpful. Esperaba más bien, eh, una pelea sobre esto.
No no, I mean, um, especially for first-time disputes we want to—déjame también, uh, añadir un bloqueo del comerciante para que no puedan cobrarte otra vez mientras esto se procesa.
Didn't know that was possible.
Added block code BLK-4492-T, y veo que compraste reemplazos ayer por $94.50, ¿quieres que marque esa compra como verificada para que no parezca sospechosa?
Um, yeah, that'd be, er, great actually. Prácticamente he, uh, llegado al límite comprando eso dos veces.
Done, tagged order ORD-9982745-V as verified legitimate purchase, y tu crédito provisional debería llegar en 24 horas mientras investigamos, ¿algo más de lo que pueda protegerte hoy?

original_conversation.content: Um, hi. I need to, uh, dispute a charge. Sort of, um, my first time doing this.
Got it, no problem at all, let me pull up the dispute form here, just need your account number first if you have that handy?
It's, um, probably 4-4-7-2. Er, wait. 9-2. I think.
Okay so, um, I've got account 4472-92 here and, uh, let me just—actually wait, I need the full—do you have the complete number? Should be, um, twelve digits total.
Perfect perfect, so, um, account ACC-447292881533 is up and, uh, I can see recent transactions here, so which charge are we, um, looking at today?
The, uh, ninety dollar one. From, um, Tuesday? I think it was, er, Beach Supply Plus.
Yep, transaction TXN-829374-BSP for $89.99 posted Tuesday the 15th, Beach Supply Plus merchant code.
Yeah so, um, they charged me for, uh, rescue tubes I never got? Kind of, um, need those for work.
Oh you're a—wait let me just, um, make a note here... lifeguard equipment not received... and, uh, have you tried contacting the merchant first or...?
Three times. They keep saying delivered.
Okay so, um, that's frustrating, let me—actually, um, since this is safety equipment for your job I'm gonna, uh, expedite this, reference number DSP-7749823-P.
Um, how long does this, er, usually take? Because I sort of, uh, already had to buy replacements.
So disputes normally run 5-7 business days but I'm marking this priority given it's work equipment, should process in 24-48 hours max.
That's, um, actually helpful. I was, er, expecting more of a, uh, fight about this.
No no, I mean, um, especially for first-time disputes we want to—let me also, uh, add a merchant block so they can't charge you again while this processes.
Didn't know that was possible.
Added block code BLK-4492-T, and I'm seeing you bought replacements yesterday for $94.50, want me to flag that purchase as verified so it doesn't look suspicious?
Um, yeah, that'd be, er, great actually. Pretty much, uh, maxed out buying those twice.
Done, tagged order ORD-9982745-V as verified legitimate purchase, and your provisional credit should hit within 24 hours while we investigate, anything else I can protect you from today?

scenario: lifeguard, young and nervous about disputing a charge for the first time ever
